entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Burk's Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:56 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.2°C

Humidity: 96 %

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 4 this morning. Forecast issued 06:42 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 06:42 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:42 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
